title: Python Try ... Except: What It Is and How to Use It
author: Jack Wallen
description: Python on its own doesn't provide informative answers about what error is causing your application to stop. Try ... except fills in the gaps.
cntitle: Python Try...Except：什么是它以及如何使用它
cndescription: Python 本身不会提供关于导致应用程序停止的错误的详细信息。尝试...除了填补了这些空白。
